io.sarl.lang.scoping.batch

Class SARLTimeExtensions

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.lang.scoping.batch.SARLTimeExtensions

  • @GwtCompatible
public final class SARLTimeExtensions
extends Object
    Static methods to convert different time units to milliseconds.
    Version:
    0.6.0 2017-09-14 18:43:59
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl.lang
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.lang.core

      • convertFromTo

        @Pure
public static double convertFromTo(double time,
                                         TimeUnit source,
                                         TimeUnit target)
        Convert the gien amount of time in the given source unit, to the given target unit. In opposite to TimeUnit.convert(long, TimeUnit), this function works on double floating-point values.
        Parameters:
        time - the amount of time.
        source - the source unit. Never null.
        target - the target unit. Never null.
        Returns:
        the amount of time in the target unit.
